data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Sandaun, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sandaun, Papua New Guinea

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 42,697 believers in Sandaun, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sandaun, Papua New Guinea. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sandaun to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Sandaun that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Sandaun to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 185,700 citizens of the the state of Sandaun.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

location.name: Sandaun
location.people_groups_list: Piame, Ninggera, Negira, Yangum Dey, Kwomtari, Papi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Piame (300), Ninggera, Negira (200), Yangum Dey (300), Kwomtari (1,200), Papi (100)
